lead_paragraph: GANZ--Arnold R.,age 90, a resident of Westport, CT, passed away peacefully at his home on January 21, 2016. Mr. Ganz was born in New York City, son of the late William and Irene Ganz, and was a United States Army Veteran who served during World War II. He was a recipient of a Purple Heart and Bronze Star. He attended Biarritz American University and NYU majoring in business administration. Mr. Ganz was President of Pervel Ind., a subsidiary of Bemis Corporation, until his retirement in 1990. He is survived by his beloved wife of 64 years, Enid W. Ganz, his devoted children; Austin (Cheryl), Harrison (Heidi), and Andrea (Robert Vogel), and adored grandchildren Evan, Bradford, and Jordan. Mr. Ganz was predeceased by his sister, Lenore Epstein. Funeral services will take place on Monday, January 25, 2016 at 11am at Temple Israel 14 Coleytown Road Westport, CT with interment at Temple Israel Cemetery, Richards Avenue in Norwalk. Memorials to the American Liver Foundation. 1/3
